item.description:
The Gold Standard (the NHLA weekly list of pro-liberty and anti-liberty bills coming up for vote) will be starting up again in January, and you know what that means – we need bill reviewers! Please contact Jeremy at research@nhliberty.org if you’d like to help review bills.

The NHLA be holding a training session on Saturday, December 13, 1-4 pm at Murphy’s Taproom. We’re also looking to schedule another training session sometime in early December, at another location.
item.name: NHLA Bill Review Training
